questions.question: Why is grain fineness important in moulding sand? (LO1)

answers.a: It determines the strength of the final casting
answers.b: It affects permeability and surface finish of the casting
answers.c: It reduces the need for binders in moulding sand
answers.d: It controls the cooling rate of molten metal

explanations.a: Grain fineness influences how well gases escape (permeability) and the smoothness of the casting surface. Fine sand improves surface finish but lowers permeability, while coarse sand increases permeability but may cause rough casting surfaces.

answers.b: It causes inaccurate grain size distribution results
